description: This file is a Flutter application source file that defines the main app widget, a home page widget, and builds a simple UI with a loading indicator and text.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Main application widget that sets up the MaterialApp with theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the home screen with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State object for MyHomePage that builds the UI with app bar and centered content.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the application that runs the MyApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp widget, returns a MaterialApp configured with theme and home.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for _MyHomePageState widget, returns Scaffold with app bar and body.
